title: Ivanti Endpoint Manager updateAssetInfo SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Ivanti Endpoint Manager. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the implementation of the updateAssetInfo method. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to construct SQL queries. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the service account.
addtionnal_details: Ivanti has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/Security-Advisory-EPM-January-2025-for-EPM-2024-and-EPM-2022-SU6
